fields.name: size
fields.description: The number of commits in the push.

fields.name: distinct_size
fields.description: The number of distinct commits in the push.

fields.name: ref
fields.description: The full git ref that was pushed.

fields.name: head
fields.description: The SHA of the most recent commit on ref after the push.

fields.name: before
fields.description: The SHA of the most recent commit on ref before the push.

fields.name: url
fields.description: URL that points to the commit API resource.

fields.name: distinct
fields.description: Whether this commit is distinct from any that have been pushed before.
